abstract: No "monkey for a week" silliness. In this video, the C.E.O., Andrew Mason, makes a serious case for his company's initial public offering.
snippet: No "monkey for a week" silliness. In this video, the C.E.O., Andrew Mason, makes a serious case for his company's initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Mason, Groupon's 30-year-old founder and chief executive, is all grown up.

headline.main: A New Video Role for Groupon's C.E.O.
